mapper.select:
select count(zz.id) as majorNumber , count(DISTINCT uu.id) as universityNumber from (select majorType,batch,universityId,majorCode,pp.planEnrolling from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=#{areaId} and pp.year=#{year} ) tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId
where zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%')

select count(zz.majorCode) from (select majorType,batch,universityId,majorCode,pp.planEnrolling from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=#{areaId} and pp.year=#{year} ) tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId where zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%') and tmp.batch=#{batch} and uu.name like concat('%',#{universityName},'%')

select uu.property as property,tmp.planEnrolling as planEnrolling from (select majorType,batch,universityId,majorCode,pp.planEnrolling from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=#{areaId} and pp.year=#{year} ) tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId where zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%') and uu.property like CONCAT('%',#{property},'%')

select count(uu.property) from (select majorType,batch,universityId,majorCode,pp.planEnrolling from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=#{areaId} and pp.year=#{year} ) tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId where zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%') and uu.property like CONCAT('%',#{property},'%')

select dd.name as batchName,sum(tmp.planEnrolling) as number from (select majorType,batch,universityId,majorCode,pp.planEnrolling from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=#{areaId} and pp.year=#{year} ) tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId left join zgk2.zgk_data_dict dd on dd.type='BATCHTYPE' and dd.dictId=tmp.batch where zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%') group by tmp.batch

select count(DISTINCT tmp.batch) from (select majorType,batch,universityId,majorCode,pp.planEnrolling from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=#{areaId} and pp.year=#{year} ) tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId where zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%')

select bb.discipline_name as disciplineName,sum(tmp.planEnrolling) as number from (select majorType,batch,universityId,majorCode,pp.planEnrolling from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=#{areaId} and pp.year=#{year} ) tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_major_base bb on bb.major_code=tmp.majorCode where zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%') group by bb.discipline_code

select count(DISTINCT bb.discipline_code) from (select majorType,batch,universityId,majorCode,pp.planEnrolling from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=#{areaId} and pp.year=#{year} ) tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_major_base bb on bb.major_code=tmp.majorCode where zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%')
select dictId as id,name from zgk2.zgk_data_dict where type=#{type}
